thread.title: BRIEF-MTS Q1 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.72

title: BRIEF-MTS Q1 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.72
text:
12 PM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-MTS Q1 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.72 Reuters Staff 
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Mts Systems Corp: * MTS REPORTS FISCAL 2018 FIRST QUARTER FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.72 * SEES FY 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.55 TO $3.85 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $780 MILLION TO $820 MILLION * Q1 REVENUE FELL 2.6 PERCENT TO $194.2 MILLION 
* ‍HAD DISCRETE TAX BENEFIT OF $25 MILLION FROM TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT OF 2017 IN QUARTER​ 
* ‍STRONG DEMAND IN SENSORS BUSINESS IS ANTICIPATED TO CONTINUE THROUGHOUT FISCAL YEAR 2018​ Source text for Eikon:
